attributes.action: Keep Pentwyn leisure centre crèche open
attributes.additional_details:
I fear this act is them breaking the ice for an announcement closing all the crèche facilities in light of the upcoming takeover.

The Creche in Pentwyn leisure is amazing as I'm sure everyone who has used it will agree. The staff are friendly caring and reliable. 

We cannot prevent the takeover of the leisure centres going ahead! 

Our only option now is to ensure that we make a united stand for the facilities that we value to remain 'GLL' will start to cut costs!.

PLEASE SIGN AND SHARE!!!!
attributes.background:
The council have cancelled the crèche within Pentwyn leisure centre during The summer holidays. It is now impossible for anyone with young children to attend. We pay for an active card under the impression that this facility would be available! 

SAVE PENTWYN LEISURE CENTRE CRÈCHE!!!

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
